Package com.epam.finaltask.validation

Provides validation classes.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CommandDataValidator
    Class that is used to check if command is allowed to be executed by user and with chosen http method.
    CommandValidator
    Validation class that is used to define if string can be associated with CommandType constant.
    EmailValidator
    Class used to validate emails.
    FileValidator
    A validation class that can be used to check if file with chosen name exists and is not a directory.
    ImageFilenameValidator
    Validation class.
    PasswordValidator
    Validation class that is used to check if password can be used for registration.
    TextValidator
    Validation class.
    UploadCommandValidator
    Validation class that is used to define if string can be associated with UploadCommandType constant.
    UsernameValidator
    Validation class that is used to check if password can be used for registration.

Package com.epam.finaltask.validation Description

Provides validation classes.
